interface Company { id: number; name: string; logo: string; location: string; revenue: string; jobCount: number; description: string; tags: string[]; } const mockCompanies: Company[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'Nomad', logo: '/images/company-logo.png', location: 'Paris, France', revenue: '75,000', jobCount: 2, description: 'A leading tech company specializing in remote work solutions', tags: ['Technology', 'Remote Work'] }, // Add more companies here ];
